name: e-commerce-fullstack
description: Full-stack E-commerce Application with React Frontend, Admin Panel, and Node.js Backend

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../Frontend && npm install && cd ../admin && npm install
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run backend" "npm run frontend" "npm run admin" --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND,ADMIN" --prefix-colors "cyan,green,yellow"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev-backend" "npm run frontend" "npm run admin" --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND,ADMIN" --prefix-colors "cyan,green,yellow"
